thread.title: Forks makes it 22 straight over Valley; SV clinches playoff spot
thread.title_full: Forks makes it 22 straight over Valley; SV clinches playoff spot

title: Forks makes it 22 straight over Valley; SV clinches playoff spot
text:
Forks makes it 22 straight over Valley; SV clinches playoff spot 
By wbng sports October 25, 2015 Updated Oct 25, 2015 at 12:21 AM EDT 
Town of Chenango, NY (WBNG Binghamton) Chenango Forks scored 29 points in the first half and rolled to its 22nd straight win over Chenango Valley on Saturday afternoon. The Blue Devils finished the season in style with a 43-27 victory over the rival Warriors. 
Forks held a 43-7 lead in the third quarter before Chenango Valley tacked on a few second half touchdowns to close the gap. 
The Blue Devils didn't show much rust after only playing once in the last three weeks because of two teams forfeiting. 
Despite the outcome both Forks and Valley enter the Section IV playoffs as the number one seeds. 
The Blue Devils play Lansing next Saturday in the Class C semis, while the Warriors host Susquehanna Valley in the Class B semifinals. 
SV clinches playoff spot Oneonta scored on its first possession against Susquehanna Valley on Saturday. After that, it was all Sabers. SV scored 37 unanswered points on its way to a 37-8 win over the visiting Yellow Jackets. 
With the win, SV clinched the final playoff spot in Class B. The Sabers will travel to CV next Saturday. 
Other Section IV football scores Newark Valley 47 - Whitney Point 6Watkins Glen/Odessa-Montour 60 - Lansing 32Seton 49 - Spencer-Van Etten 48Delhi 13 - Cooperstown 8 To submit a comment on this article, your email address is required.
